name: husk_spawn_02
text: I know what life is worth.
text_simple: i know what life is worth

name: husk_spawn_04
text: My life is in your hands.
text_simple: my life is in your hands

name: husk_spawn_05
text: To the Nothl Realm, I give my all.
text_simple: to the nothl realm i give my all

name: husk_battlebegins_01
text: Show me where I can do the most good.
text_simple: show me where i can do the most good

name: husk_firstblood_01
text: First blood! The gods were right to place their trust in me.
text_simple: first blood the gods were right to place their trust in me

name: husk_attack_10
text: I'd stake my life on it.
text_simple: id stake my life on it

name: husk_cast_02
text: I'll take all you have to give!

name: husk_level_02
text: Ah, the potential for sacrifice is great!
text_simple: ah the potential for sacrifice is great

name: husk_level_03
text: The gods wish more of me.
text_simple: the gods wish more of me

name: husk_level_04
text: This power will not go to waste.
text_simple: this power will not go to waste

name: husk_level_05
text: The gods grant me life, nor shall I waste it.
text_simple: the gods grant me life nor shall i waste it

name: husk_level_06
text: All I'm given, I will give back.
text_simple: all im given i will give back

name: husk_level_08
text: To the Nothl Realm, my gratitude!
text_simple: to the nothl realm my gratitude

name: husk_level_09
text: There can never be too much sacrifice.
text_simple: there can never be too much sacrifice

name: husk_level_10
text: Ha ha har har har har.
text_simple: ha ha har har har har

name: husk_kill_01
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Killing a hero

name: husk_kill_04
text: You gave all you could give but it was not enough.
text_simple: you gave all you could give but it was not enough

name: husk_kill_06

name: husk_kill_11
text: Great honors await you in the Nothl Realm.
text_simple: great honors await you in the nothl realm
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Killing a hero

name: husk_rival_01
text: Dazzle, is that any way to treat your cousin?
text_simple: dazzle is that any way to treat your cousin

name: husk_rival_02
text: Your time in the shade of Nothl must have blinded you, Dazzle.
text_simple: your time in the shade of nothl must have blinded you dazzle

name: husk_rival_03
text: This pains me, Doctor, for we honor the same vitality.
text_simple: this pains me doctor for we honor the same vitality

name: husk_rival_04
text: Antimage, your dependence on mana is unholy.
text_simple: antimage your dependence on mana is unholy

name: husk_rival_05
text: You take and you take, Antimage; learn to give!
text_simple: you take and you take antimage learn to give

name: husk_rival_10
text: The tide of life sweeps away the hunter.
text_simple: the tide of life sweeps away the hunter

name: husk_rival_11
text: The oceans see more life without the Tidehunter.
text_simple: the oceans see more life without the tidehunter

name: husk_rival_12
text: Pudge, you should value life for more than just its flavor.
text_simple: pudge you should value life for more than just its flavor

name: husk_rival_13
text: Pudge, you were an unsavory morsel.
text_simple: pudge you were an unsavory morsel

name: husk_rival_14
text: Pudge, your existence wastes more life than you know.
text_simple: pudge your existence wastes more life than you know

name: husk_rival_15
text: Fearlessly into the fray, Axe, in this we are alike.
text_simple: fearlessly into the fray axe in this we are alike

name: husk_death_08
text: My life comes to nothing. Rruh.
text_simple: my life comes to nothing rruh

name: husk_death_09
text: I have no more to give.
text_simple: i have no more to give

name: husk_death_10
text: I'll never live this down. Eeaah.

name: husk_death_15
text: I return to the Nothl Realm. Ooo.
text_simple: i return to the nothl realm ooo

name: husk_fastres_01
text: The sacred warrior falls, ahg, but not for long.
text_simple: the sacred warrior falls ahg but not for long

name: husk_fastres_02
text: I have still more to give.
text_simple: i have still more to give

name: husk_respawn_01

name: husk_respawn_02
text: From the Nothl Realm, I return.

name: husk_respawn_03
text: Another chance to offer all I have.
text_simple: another chance to offer all i have

name: husk_respawn_04
text: I thank you for this second chance at sacrifice.
text_simple: i thank you for this second chance at sacrifice

name: husk_respawn_05
text: This life, I swear I shall not squander.
text_simple: this life i swear i shall not squander

name: husk_respawn_07
text: The rites have yet to run their course.
text_simple: the rites have yet to run their course

name: husk_respawn_08
text: I have so much more to give.
text_simple: i have so much more to give

name: husk_respawn_09
text: Praise the power that lets me offer my life again.
text_simple: praise the power that lets me offer my life again

name: husk_rare_01
text: I walk the sacred path to my promised destiny.
text_simple: i walk the sacred path to my promised destiny

name: husk_rare_02
text: As my body falls, my spirit rises up like the smoke of offerings, pleasing to the gods.
text_simple: as my body falls my spirit rises up like the smoke of offerings pleasing to the gods

name: husk_rare_03
text: Those who are given more in life must not cling to it but risk it all at every moment.
text_simple: those who are given more in life must not cling to it but risk it all at every moment

text: Ahh, this will please the gods.
